verses.verse: Who (Amos 2:8; 4:1) drink wine from bowls, And anoint yourselves with the best ointments, (Gen. 37:25) But are not grieved for the affliction of Joseph.
Therefore they shall now go (Amos 5:27) captive as the first of the captives, And those who recline at banquets shall be removed.

(Gen. 22:16; Jer. 51:14; Amos 4:2; 8:7; Heb. 6:13-17) The Lord GOD has sworn by Himself, The LORD God of hosts says: “I abhor (Ps. 47:4; Ezek. 24:21; Amos 8:7) the pride of Jacob, And hate his palaces; Therefore I will deliver up the city And all that is in it.”
Then it shall come to pass, that if ten men remain in one house, they shall die.

And when a relative of the dead, with one who will burn the bodies, picks up the bodies to take them out of the house, he will say to one inside the house, “Are there any more with you?” Then someone will say, “None.” And he will say, (Amos 5:13) “Hold your tongue! (Amos 8:3) For we dare not mention the name of the LORD.”
For behold, (Is. 55:11) the LORD gives a command: (2 Kin. 25:9; Amos 3:15) He will break the great house into bits, And the little house into pieces.

Do horses run on rocks? Does one plow there with oxen? Yet (1 Kin. 21:7-13; Is. 59:13, 14; Hos. 10:4; Amos 5:7, 11, 12) you have turned justice into gall, And the fruit of righteousness into wormwood,
You who rejoice over Lo Debar, Who say, “Have we not taken Karnaim for ourselves By our own strength?”

“But, behold, (Jer. 5:15) I will raise up a nation against you, O house of Israel,” Says the LORD God of hosts; “And they will afflict you from the (Num. 34:7, 8; 1 Kin. 8:65; 2 Kin. 14:25) entrance of Hamath To the Valley of the Arabah.”
Vision of the Locusts Thus the Lord GOD showed me: Behold, He formed locust swarms at the beginning of the late crop; indeed it was the late crop after the king’s mowings.
And so it was, when they had finished eating the grass of the land, that I said: “O Lord GOD, forgive, I pray! (Is. 51:19) Oh, that Jacob may stand, For he is small!”
So (Deut. 32:36; Jer. 26:19; Hos. 11:8; Amos 5:15; Jon. 3:10; (James 5:16)) the LORD relented concerning this. “It shall not be,” said the LORD.
Vision of the Fire Thus the Lord GOD showed me: Behold, the Lord GOD called for conflict by fire, and it consumed the great deep and devoured the territory.
Then I said: “O Lord GOD, cease, I pray! (Amos 7:2, 3) Oh, that Jacob may stand, For he is small!”
So the LORD relented concerning this. “This also shall not be,” said the Lord GOD.
Vision of the Plumb Line Thus He showed me: Behold, the Lord stood on a wall made with a plumb line, with a plumb line in His hand.

And the LORD said to me, “Amos, what do you see?” And I said, “A plumb line.” Then the Lord said: “Behold, (2 Kin. 21:13; Is. 28:17; 34:11; Lam. 2:8) I am setting a plumb line In the midst of My people Israel; (Mic. 7:18) I will not pass by them anymore.
